description: Identifier for the maintenance task or template linked to the asset; likely a human-readable code. Confirm with SME.
Numeric schedule or step number within the task/template to order procedures or intervals; confirm with SME.
Row or line within the schedule or template used for grouping or ordering entries.
Execution sequence used to control processing or display order when multiple rows exist.
Unique identifier of the asset to which the maintenance task or schedule applies.
Category of the asset (for example, vehicle, generator) used for grouping, business rules, or reporting.
User ID or system process that created the record, captured for audit trail.
Date and time the record was created.
User ID or system process that last modified the record.
Date and time of the most recent update.
Code for the site or facility where the asset is located or maintenance is performed.
Identifier for a sublocation within the site (such as building, bay, or area) for precise placement.
Identifier of the asset subsystem or component targeted by the task; likely a component reference. Confirm with SME.
Percentage of maintenance cost allocated to this asset or line within a shared task (0 to 100).
